Agents Wanted

Section: Item Display

AGENTS WANTED.—Individuals wishing to travel in different sections of the United
States will find steady employment during the year, circulating valuable and
interesting publications, by calling upon the subscribers, HUTCHINSON &
DWIER, or B.B.BARBER  – Hartford, February
1834.                          
m6                  
22

Section: Featured Content

Above: Opening article, on the poet William Cowper (a perpetual favorite of Abolitionists), in the January 1834 issue of the North American Review
